TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 525
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 10-30-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Editorial by Austin. October 80, 1830. Explaining refusal of Ayuntamiento of San Felipe to join that of Saltillo in expelling certain deputies from the legislature. (Omitted,)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 525

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Editorial by Austin. October 80, 1830. Explaining refusal of Ayuntamiento of San Felipe to join that of Saltillo in expelling certain deputies from the legislature. (Omitted,)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-30-1830">October 30, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
